title: Awesome Project
description: A modern, dynamic project featuring real-time data.
methodology: Used a Node.js backend, real-time APIs, and Vanilla JS.

overview.story: This project started as an experiment in real-time weather data. We built a clean UI to display updated stats.
overview.collectedData: Fetched from OpenWeatherMap, processed data daily, stored results in a small MySQL DB.
overview.conclusions: Discovered a lot about asynchronous calls and performance tuning!

title: Machine Learning Demo
description: Exploring data science and ML algorithms.
methodology: Used Python, Pandas, and scikit-learn for classification tasks.

overview.story: Wanted to classify images and tabular data with minimal overhead.
overview.collectedData: CIFAR-10 dataset plus local CSVs. Preprocessed in Jupyter Notebooks.
overview.conclusions: 90%+ accuracy with a CNN approach. The results were quite promising!
